creator: Various
description:
LibriVox recording of Short Story Collection Vol. 064 by Various.
Read in English by Newgatenovelist; VfkaBT; Tony Addison; Craig Campbell; Judi Mason; Lynne Thompson; Jasmine Jallow; Lilith Branda; Paul Rizik; Michele McFarland; Esther ben Simonides

This collection comprises 20 short stories of various genres, chosen by the readers. Contributions include works from Guy de Maupassant, Rudyard Kipling, Ray Bradbury, Anton Chekhov, and Gustave Flaubert, among others. - Summary by Ruth Golding

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B Audiobook (207MB)
subject: librivox; audiobooks
